amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Home land Security to conduct tests of unmanned aerial vehicles for border surveillance along the border between Canada and the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4621 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4621 proposed by Senator Baucus. (consideration: CR S7388-7389, S7390-7391; text: CR S7388) To require the Secretary of Home land Security to conduct tests of unmanned aerial vehicles for border surveillance along the border between Canada and the United States.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4621 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4621 proposed by Senator Baucus.
